data.title: Services

Services  
Services

Added Value Services
PlanningForce is also a team of experts who will help you unlock the full productive potential of your organization while helping you create new opportunities.  

"For us, PlanningForce
data.text:
Added Value Services

PlanningForce is also a team of experts, there to guide you as you unlock the full productive potential of your organization while helping you create new opportunities.

Services

Process Consultancy

Starting from the identification of your needs, we analyze the various dimensions of your processes and provide you with an analytical report. It will serve as the foundation for the solution blueprint. Process Consultancy services also cover the design of the new or updated processes as well as the design of the user roles and use cases of the future solution.

Services

Technical Consultancy

Technical Consultancy services consist of analyzing the data flows between the various software products and database of your information system. Based on the solution blueprint, it designs the interfaces that need to be realized between all of these software packages. Technical Consultancy services also cover the prototyping of the solution, the data migration, and performance testing.

Services

Custom Development

Custom Development covers the specific development of business rules, algorithms, third-party software interfaces, reports and dashboards. These will be added to the standard modules of PlanningForce, via plugins, in order to meet specific requirements or peculiarities of business processes.

Services

Training and Support

Training and support covers the design and creation of the training material for the various user groups as well as the training sessions themselves. The training material is based on practical use cases as defined in the analysis phase. Follow-up and support consists of providing regular and on-demand support, both online and on site, to users once the system is up and running.

Services

Strategic Consultancy

Strategic Consultancy is a service designed to help the company that has implemented PlanningForce to get the most out of its new solution. This service includes performance analysis and the design and implementation of strategies to improve the following factors: resource utilization, reduce time-to-market for new products, increase project profitability, reduce customer turnover and increase employee satisfaction.

Services

IT Infrastructure and Hosting

IT infrastructure services are provided to help our clients optimize the design and maintenance of their hardware and protocols, such as security protocols, in connection with the use of the various PlanningForce products. We also provide hosting of our solutions when requested by the client.
